verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came again to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> the prince <S%H5057><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because your heart <S%H3820><s%> is lifted up, <S%H1361><s%> and you have said, <S%H559><s%> I am a god, <S%H410><s%> I sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H3820><s%> of the seas; <S%H3220><s%> yet you are man, <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> though you set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>—
behold, <S%H2450><s%> you are wiser than Daniel; <S%H1840><s%> there is no secret <S%H5640><s%> that is hidden from you; <S%H5640><s%>

by your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and by your understanding <S%H8394><s%> you have gotten <S%H6213><s%> yourself riches, <S%H2428><s%> and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> into your treasures; <S%H214><s%>

by your great <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and by your traffic <S%H7404><s%> you have increased <S%H7235><s%> your riches, <S%H2428><s%> and your heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted up <S%H1361><s%> because of your riches <S%H2428><s%>—
therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because you have set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3824><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%>

therefore, <S%H935><s%> behold, I will bring strangers <S%H2114><s%> on you, <S%H6184><s%> the terrible of the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and they shall draw <S%H7324><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against the beauty <S%H3308><s%> of your wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and they shall defile <S%H2490><s%> your brightness. <S%H3314><s%>

They shall bring you down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit; <S%H7845><s%> and you shall die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4463><s%> of those who are slain, <S%H2491><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>

Will you yet <S%H559><s%> say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him who kills <S%H2026><s%> you, <S%H430><s%> I am God? but you are man, <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him who wounds you. <S%H2490><s%>

You shall die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers: <S%H2114><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> You seal up <S%H2856><s%> the sum, <S%H8508><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and perfect <S%H3632><s%> in beauty. <S%H3308><s%>

You were in Eden, <S%H5731><s%> the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> every precious <S%H3368><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> adorned <S%H4540><s%> you: <S%H124><s%> ruby, topaz, <S%H6357><s%> emerald, <S%H3095><s%> chrysolite, <S%H8658><s%> onyx, <S%H7718><s%> jasper, <S%H3471><s%> sapphire, <S%H5601><s%> turquoise, <S%H5306><s%> and beryl. <S%H1304><s%> Gold <S%H2091><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> of tambourines <S%H8596><s%> and of pipes <S%H5345><s%> was in you. <S%H3117><s%> In the day that you were created <S%H1254><s%> they were prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

You were the anointed <S%H4473><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> who covers: <S%H5526><s%> and I set <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H6944><s%> so that you were on the holy mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> you have walked up and down <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
You were perfect <S%H8549><s%> in your ways <S%H1870><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were created, <S%H1254><s%> until unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> was found in you. <S%H4672><s%>

By the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of your traffic <S%H7404><s%> they filled <S%H4390><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you with violence, <S%H2555><s%> and you have sinned: <S%H2398><s%> therefore I have cast you as profane <S%H2490><s%> out of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and I have destroyed <S%H6><s%> you, <S%H5526><s%> covering cherub, <S%H3742><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

Your heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted up <S%H1361><s%> because of your beauty; <S%H3308><s%> you have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> by reason of <S%H5921><s%> your brightness: <S%H3314><s%> I have cast <S%H7993><s%> you to the ground; <S%H776><s%> I have laid <S%H5414><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> that they may see you. <S%H7200><s%>

By the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> in the unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> of your traffic, <S%H7404><s%> you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> your sanctuaries; <S%H4720><s%> therefore have I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you; <S%H398><s%> it has devoured you, <S%H5414><s%> and I have turned you to ashes <S%H665><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all those who see you. <S%H7200><s%>

All those who know <S%H3045><s%> you among the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at you: <S%H1091><s%> you have become a terror, and you shall <S%H369><s%> nevermore have any being. <S%H5704><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> and prophesy against it, <S%H5012><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Behold, <S%H6721><s%> I am against you, Sidon; and I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you; <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in her, <S%H6942><s%> and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will send <S%H7971><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%> into her, <S%H1818><s%> and blood into her streets; <S%H2351><s%> and the wounded <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her, <S%H2719><s%> with the sword on her on every side; <S%H5439><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

There shall be no more a pricking <S%H3992><s%> brier <S%H5544><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> nor a hurting <S%H3510><s%> thorn <S%H6975><s%> of any that are around <S%H5439><s%> them, <S%H7590><s%> that scorned them; <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> When I shall have gathered <S%H6908><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> among whom they are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> then shall they dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> to my servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

They shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> therein; <S%H1129><s%> yes, they shall build houses, <S%H1004><s%> and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> when I have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on all those who do them despite <S%H7590><s%> all around <S%H5439><s%> them; <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>
